headline: Caldera Launches PrimeCenter 4.0, Introducing an Easier Way to Automate Digital Printing Job Preparation
summary: Caldera, part of Dover (NYSE: DOV), today announced the release of PrimeCenter 4.0, a major update to its innovative production automation software designed to simplify job preparation and accelerate production workflows for digital printing companies of all sizes. This update introduces an expanded interface and automation features that allow users to prepare files for production in just a few clicks.

headline: Graphic Packaging to Shut Down Operations at Middletown Facility
summary: GPK plans to close its Middletown facility in June to consolidate recycled paperboard production into Kalamazoo and the new Waco facility in Texas.

raw.headline: Graphic Packaging to Shut Down Operations at Middletown Facility
raw.summary: GPK plans to close its Middletown facility in June to consolidate recycled paperboard production into Kalamazoo and the new Waco facility in Texas.

headline: EnerSys to Shut Down Mexico Plant & Shift Production to US
summary: ENS' restructuring plan includes the closure of its flooded lead-acid battery plant in Monterrey and moving its production to its existing manufacturing facility in Richmond, KY.

raw.headline: EnerSys to Shut Down Mexico Plant & Shift Production to US
raw.summary: ENS' restructuring plan includes the closure of its flooded lead-acid battery plant in Monterrey and moving its production to its existing manufacturing facility in Richmond, KY.
